quote: If Christ were here there is one thing he would not be—a Christian.
author: Mark Twain,  Notebook

quote: God, who am I?
author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

quote: It's time we capture our imaginations for Christ
author: Peter E. Gillquist,  Becoming Orthodox: A Journey to the Ancient Christian Faith

quote: God steals my soul.
author: Harley King

quote: Sonetimes the hardest person to forgive is yourself.
author: Sarah Sundin

quote: A lot of people come up here and they thank Jesus for this award. I want you to know that no one had less to do with this award than Jesus. He didn't help me a bit. If it was up to him, Cesar Millan would be up here with that damn dog. So all I can say is, 'suck it, Jesus! This award is my God now'!
author: Kathy Griffin

quote: I need Christ, not something that resembles Him.
author: C.S. Lewis,  A Grief Observed

quote: If Jesus Christ were to come today, people would not even crucify him. They would ask him to dinner, and hear what he had to say, and make fun of it.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Lord help my poor soul.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: Forgiveness is God's greatest gift
author: Dan Brown,  The Da Vinci Code

quote: I'm so thankful for the active obedience of Christ. No hope without it.
author: John Gresham Machen

quote: The worst moment for the atheist is when he is really thankful and has nobody to thank.
author: Dante Gabriel Rossetti

quote: Don't be in a hurry to condemn because he doesn't do what you do or think as you think or as fast. There was a time when you didn't know what you know today.
author: Malcolm X

quote: Our identity rests in God's relentless tenderness for us revealed in Jesus Christ.
author: Brennan Manning,  Abba's Child: The Cry of the Heart for Intimate Belonging

quote: God blesses to the degree in which you believe.
author: Pamela R. Jeffers,  Something Old, New, Borrowed & True

quote: That God does not exist, I cannot deny, That my whole being cries out for God I cannot forget.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Then was ashamed of myself. I should be happy for what I'd been given. I hoped God hadn't noticed my lapse in appreciation.
author: Charlaine Harris,  Dead and Gone

quote: God save us from religion.
author: David Eddings

quote: The glory of Christianity is to conquer by forgiveness.
author: William Blake

quote: This is heaven my child.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: Want to keep Christ in Christmas? Feed the hungry, clothe the naked, forgive the guilty, welcome the unwanted, care for the ill, love your enemies, and do unto others as you would have done unto you.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: If you don't feel as close to God today as you did yesterday, who moved?
author: Chris Heimerdinger,  Feathered Serpent, Part 1

quote: Thank God I am not God! Thank God I am not God!
author: Allen Ginsberg,  Kaddish and Other Poems

quote: God is here. This truth should fill our lives, and every Christmas should be for us a new and special meeting with God, when we allow his light and grace to enter deep into our soul.
author: Josemaría Escrivá,  Christ Is Passing by

quote: Growing up going to Christian school and the concept that you're born a sinner and you don't really have a choice to change who you are has been hammered into my head and created the entire reason why I made art and made a band and made records called 'Antichrist Superstar.'
author: Marilyn Manson

quote: All Dogs Go To Heaven? Sorry, kids. It's only the dogs who've accepted Christ.
author: Stephen Colbert,  I Am America

quote: What I've come to learn is that the world is never saved in grand messianic gestures, but in the simple accumulation of gentle, soft, almost invisible acts of compassion.
author: Chris Abani

quote: That Jesus Kinda' Love [20w] What people do for the loveof their Lord and Savior, Jesus Christ,I wouldn't do for my fucking mother.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: There is hope in forgiveness
author: John Piper,  A Sweet and Bitter Providence: Sex, Race, and the Sovereignty of God

quote: God's mercy and grace give me hope - for myself, and for our world.
author: Billy Graham

quote: When he says we’re forgiven, let’s unload the guilt. When he says we’re valuable, let’s believe him. . . . When he says we’re provided for, let’s stop worrying. God’s efforts are strongest when our efforts are useless
author: Max Lucado,  Grace for the Moment: Inspirational Thoughts for Each Day of the Year

quote: [Y]ou have to stop loving and pursuing Christ in order to sin. When you are pursuing love, running toward Christ, you do not have opportunity to wonder, *Am I doing this right?* or *Did I serve enough this week?* When you are running toward Christ, you are freed up to serve, love, and give thanks without guilt, worry or fear. As long as you are running, you're safe.
author: Francis Chan,  Crazy Love: Overwhelmed by a Relentless God

quote: Christ is not valued at all, unless he is valued above all.
author: Augustine of Hippo

quote: How many observe Christ's birthday! How few, His precepts!
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Hate the sin, love the sinner.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: A woman I had sex with is carrying my child, because God has made it so that my hands are full. They’re full of hope for the future.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: I swear to God . . .”“God doesn’t come to this part of the house, so swear to me.” -Liam C
author: J.J. McAvoy

quote: Child, child, do you not see? For each of us comes a time when we must be more than what we are.
author: Lloyd Alexander,  The Black Cauldron

quote: I am fallen, flawed and imperfect. Yet drenched in the grace and mercy that is found in Jesus Christ, there is strength
author: Adam Young

quote: That's ridiculous."Especially the part about Christian being manly.
author: Richelle Mead,  Spirit Bound

quote: We are not as Christ-centered and cross-cherishing as we should be, because we do not ponder the truth that everything good, and everything bad that God turns for the good, was purchased by the sufferings of Christ.
author: John Piper,  The Passion of Jesus Christ

quote: For God so loved the World that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: Lie to me. Just to console my soul.
author: Jarod Kintz,  99 Cents For Some Nonsense

quote: We should live our lives as though Christ was coming this afternoon.
author: Jimmy Carter

quote: People are not being reached in the context of the body of Christ--they're like newborn babies being left on a doorstep somewhere to feed and care for themselves.
author: Peter E. Gillquist,  Becoming Orthodox: A Journey to the Ancient Christian Faith

quote: Remember: He WANTS your fellowship, and He has done everything possible to make it a reality. He has forgiven your sins, at the cost of His own dear Son. He has given you His Word, and the priceless privilege of prayer and worship.
author: Billy Graham,  Hope for Each Day: Words of Wisdom and Faith

quote: The great thing to remember is that though our feelings come and go God's love for us does not.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: To be a Christian means to forgive the inexcusable because God has forgiven the inexcusable in you.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Believe, my child. Faith is the food of survival.
author: Tobsha Learner,  The Witch of Cologne

quote: If you feel far from God, guess who moved?
author: Robin Jones Gunn,  Surprise Endings
